DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether addition dual Five Alpha Reductase Inhitor ( Dutasteride ) alleviate urinary retention secondary BPH fail void trial without catheter . Following treatment Alpha Blocker alone .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Refractory Urinary Retention Secondary Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ( BPH ) With Dual Five Alpha Reductase Inhibition Combined With Alpha Blocker
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males betewen age 50 90 year age.Written inform consent . 2 . Men acute urinary retention attribute bladder outlet obstruction cause BPH , fail atleast 1 week trial alpha blocker treatment . 3 . PSA level equal great 1.5ng/ml equal less 15 ng/ml . 1 . Urinary retention attribute neurogenic myogenic bladder dysfunction . 2 . Use psychotrophic medication . 3 . Use antichollinergic medication . 4 . Prostate cancer . 5 . Allery five alpha reductase inhibitor . 6 . Prior prostate surgery . 7 . Urethral stricture . 8 . Bladder calculus . 9 . Invasive bladder cancer . 10 . Inability understand agree requirement study . 11 . Any investigational drug receive within 30 day prior study entry .
DOC.keyword: Urinary retention secondary benign prostatic hyperplasia
